text: Late last year, Tom Cruise confirmed that the 1986 blockbuster will return with a mind - blowing sequel with the actor reprising the iconic Maverick role. The Mission : Impossible 6 star also revealed that the movie's title confirming that Top Gun 2 will adopt the lead character's name in the title. The sequel will be called, Top Gun : Maverick. Following the announcement, no other official announcements regarding the movie's cast or plot were shared thereafter as the actor got involved in wrapping up MI6. With no more official word available, a report by Star claims that Cruise has approached John Travolta's wife Kelly Preston to co - star in the movie.
